name: Doraemon: Nobita Resident Evil 2 english
description:
The anime doraemon but resident evil
Nobita no Biohazard (from now on nobihaza) is a parody of the Biohazard series (known in the West as Resident Evil) featuring the cast of Doraemon characters. The game was released on 2007 by aaa. Since then, many people have modified the game and spawned many mods and scenarios which not only expands the Nobihaza universe, but adds some new interesting mechanics and gameplay. And in 2020, it’s finally translated to English by one person (Shadab Mallick).
all the credit goes to aaa,RPG maker 200 staff and Shadab Mallick
